short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your browser sessions. Save your current workspace and load it whenever you need it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make your browsing experience easier with better tab management.
Easily save, update, remove, and restore sessions!
Common uses:
- Grouping pages of common interest.
- Creating sessions for the pages you use every day.
- Saving pages during research or work into grouped names sessions.
